analysis.key_quote: This proposal would fundamentally undermine the merit-based foundations of the federal civil service by allowing agencies to designate certain career positions—specifically those deemed 'policy-influencing'—as Schedule Policy/Career roles, exempt from long-standing due process protections under Title 5.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about the erosion of merit-based principles and due process protections, as well as the potential for increased politicization of the civil service.
